name: Chainsaw Juggler
description:
Why juggle fruit, batons, or balls when you can juggle a Chainsaw. What could be better? Flaming Chainsaws!!

Don't drop anything or touch a blade! Tap to keep dangerous objects flying in the air. Take it easy with a chainsaw and fruit, or have fun with crazy combinations of chainsaws, torches, knives, and more. A new combination every game!

Can you last 30 seconds? Can you last a minute?

Expert Tip: Tap below the red line to keep your bonus multiplier increasing to set big scores.
